title: Advertising Fee Details

xdm:accountMediaFees.title: Account Media Fees
xdm:accountMediaFees.description: Media fees for the account but not billable by DSP.

xdm:accountDataFees.title: Account Data Fees
xdm:accountDataFees.description: Data fees for the account but not billable by DSP.

xdm:accountOtherFees.title: Account Other Fees
xdm:accountOtherFees.description: Other fees for the account but not billable by DSP.

xdm:advertiserMediaFees.title: Advertiser Media Fees
xdm:advertiserMediaFees.description: Media advertiser fees charged to the advertiser from the account.

xdm:advertiserDataFees.title: Advertiser Data Fees
xdm:advertiserDataFees.description: Other advertiser fees charged to the advertiser from the account.

xdm:advertiserOtherFees.title: Advertiser Other Fees
xdm:advertiserOtherFees.description: Other advertiser fees charged to the advertiser from the account.

xdm:billableMediaNetSpend.title: Billable Media Net Spend
xdm:billableMediaNetSpend.description: The billable net spend for media advertising.

xdm:totalMediaNetSpend.title: Total Media Net Spend
xdm:totalMediaNetSpend.description: The total net spend for media advertising.

xdm:billableDataNetSpend.title: Billable Data Net Spend
xdm:billableDataNetSpend.description: The billable net spend for data advertising.

xdm:billableOtherNetSpend.title: Billable Other Net Spend
xdm:billableOtherNetSpend.description: The billable net spend for other types of advertising.
